definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
brief period of enthusiasm/flash in the pan

sentences.english: The “others” were asleep, while they both breathed the same fever.
sentences.chinese: “他人”都睡熟了，只有他们两个呼吸着同一种热度。

sentences.english: Blowing on fire intensifies the heat.
The pot should only smile with heat.
In the meantime, try changing positions and suing heat to relieve it.
sentences.chinese: 同时，试着改变姿势和诉诸热度来缓解它。

sentences.english: By continually posting comments, fans can help increase the popularity of their favorite stars' micro-blogs.
sentences.chinese: 发表评论，粉丝们能帮助喜爱的明星微博的热度。

sentences.english: the sun's heat and ultraviolet rays will kill anything inside.
sentences.chinese: 阳光的热度和紫外线会杀死水中的任何有害物。

sentences.english: The insulation oven can be mounted to the system to keep the shoes hot before pressing the soles.
sentences.chinese: 可加装保温烘箱，在压底之前保持鞋子热度。

sentences.english: A vague goal like this is generally pretty half-hearted.
sentences.chinese: 像这种模糊的目标通常是三分钟热度。

sentences.english: Otherwise, the solidification structure for different superheat was simulated.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上还模拟了不同过热度下铸坯的凝固组织。

sentences.english: With double-layered porcelain insulation, a full cup of nice warm, hot tea will never boil your hand.
sentences.chinese: 倒满杯的热开水，双层陶瓷隔绝了热度让杯缘不烫手。

sentences.english: Do you think haze is caused by heat?
sentences.chinese: 你认为尘雾是由热度所造成的吗？

sentences.english: She registered fever on the thermometer.
Superheating of steam while maintaining the temperature over a range of boiler operating conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在大的操作范围内继续维持正常的蒸汽过热度。

sentences.english: In this cosmic crime scene, it's all about heat and chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 在这个天体犯罪现场，热度和化学物质是重要的证据。

sentences.english: Interestingly, the appeal of studying education seems to be slipping.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，学习教育学的热度一直在不断下滑。

sentences.english: Inlet subcooling and system pressure are varied as parameters.
sentences.chinese: 进口欠热度及系统压力作为变化参数。

definition: public praise/public reputation/commonly held opinions/current idiom
amusing speech or act/jokes/antics/funny/amusing/Taiwan pr. [xue1 tou2]
to be a big hit/to be hugely popular
(neologism c. 2014) celebrity with a huge, devoted fan base/celebrity with a huge following on social media
(of prices, rates etc) to remain high
to become hot/temperature rise/(fig.) to intensify/to hot up/to escalate/to get a boost
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
